Reviews.Title: SONY HX200V
Reviews.Author: Julio Chipuazo
Reviews.Content: I bought it from Big Value. Arrived on time ands as expected. Now took many photos and videos. WAW... amazing pictures. its equipped optic and digital zooms will let you see in details objects far away from you, even read clearly a more tha 750m board. very good. still: with a full set of accessories you cant find easily. I am loving it and my with too.thanks Big Value. keep doing good busyness

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: WV Gal
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that could take great pictures without needing to switch out lenses (already have a camera for that).  This camera takes beautiful pictures, simply.  It's lightweight, so it's easy to carry.  I purchased the camera in a kit that included everything I'll need to take pictures for a long, long time.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.2 megapixels "Exmor R" CMOS sensor for superior low-light performance
30X optical zoom
3.0-inch LCD
GPS and Compass record shot location & direction
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with 3-way Active Mode
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Black) + 32GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + Extended Life Battery + Ac/Dc Rapid Charger + USB Card Reader + Memory Card Wallet + Deluxe Case w/Strap + Shock Proof Deluxe Case + Mini HDMI to HDMI Cable + Professional Full Size Tripod + Accessory Saver Bundle!
